程序包 com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

类 MainActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.MainActivityTest
public class MainActivityTest extends Object
Espresso UI tests for MainActivity, verifying navigation intents to different activities within the application. This class demonstrates the usage of ActivityScenarioRule for launching the activity under test and Espresso Intents for intent verification.

The tests ensure that the appropriate activities are started upon clicking specific buttons in MainActivity, validating the application's navigational logic.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    androidx.test.ext.junit.rules.ActivityScenarioRule<MainActivity>
    activityScenarioRule
    Sets up ActivityScenarioRule for MainActivity, providing a functional testing environment by launching the activity before each test method.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    navigateToAdminActivity()
    Verifies that clicking the "Administrator" button correctly starts the AdminActivity.
    void
    navigateToAttendeeActivity()
    Verifies that clicking the attendee button in MainActivity correctly starts the AttendeeActivity.
    void
    navigateToEventListActivity()
    Tests the navigation to EventListActivity from MainActivity by simulating a click on the organizer button and verifying that the correct intent is sent to launch the target activity.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes Espresso Intents before each test to prepare for intent verification.
    void
    tearDown()
    Cleans up and releases Espresso Intents after each test to avoid memory leaks and ensure a clean state for subsequent tests.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes Espresso Intents before each test to prepare for intent verification.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up and releases Espresso Intents after each test to avoid memory leaks and ensure a clean state for subsequent tests.

    • navigateToAttendeeActivity

      public void navigateToAttendeeActivity()
      Verifies that clicking the attendee button in MainActivity correctly starts the AttendeeActivity. This test simulates user interaction and checks that the intended activity is launched.

    • navigateToEventListActivity

      public void navigateToEventListActivity()
      Tests the navigation to EventListActivity from MainActivity by simulating a click on the organizer button and verifying that the correct intent is sent to launch the target activity.

    • navigateToAdminActivity

      public void navigateToAdminActivity()
      Verifies that clicking the "Administrator" button correctly starts the AdminActivity. This test simulates a user interaction with the UI and checks the intent to ensure the target activity is invoked. The use of Espresso Intents allows for precise verification of the component that should be started as a result of the interaction.
